main event: A bright luminous object, greenish yellow, was observed hovering at high altitude approximately 55-60 miles west of Vandenberg AFB, California.
interesting points: The object flashed intermittently,The observation took place in daylight,The sighting was made using ground radar,The object was reported to be 15 to 20 degrees above the horizon traveling west to east,Two independent observers, including a weather forecaster and a missile division officer, did not see the phenomenon.
sighted object: a bright luminous object with greenish-yellow flame
witness description: one weather forecaster and one officer from the 1st Missile Division
